entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Yellowknife
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:40 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -36.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yellowknife Airport 02:56 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -36.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %

Dewpoint: -40.2°C

Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
